body:
**What keywords did you search in Kubernetes issues before filing this one?** (If you have found any duplicates, you should instead reply there.): test-integration

---

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?** (choose one): BUG REPORT

**Kubernetes version** (use `kubectl version`):  `Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"6+", GitVersion:"v1.6.0-alpha.1.785+be88bebb31a709", GitCommit:"be88bebb31a709ffed6325db3b431a3053cabf0e", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-02-13T20:41:51Z", GoVersion:"go1.7.4", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"}`


**Environment**:
- **Cloud provider or hardware configuration**: n/a
- **OS** (e.g. from /etc/os-release): macOS 10.11.6
- **Kernel** (e.g. `uname -a`): `Darwin kthxbye.local 15.6.0 Darwin Kernel Version 15.6.0: Mon Jan  9 23:07:29 PST 2017; root:xnu-3248.60.11.2.1~1/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64`
- **Others**: 
```
etcd -version
etcd Version: 3.0.16
Git SHA: GitNotFound
Go Version: go1.7.4
Go OS/Arch: darwin/amd64
```

**What happened**: `make test-integration` fails to start etcd instance
```
#...
+++ [0223 10:39:40] Starting etcd instance
/Users/spiffxp/w/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/third_party/etcd:/Users/spiffxp/bin:/Users/spiffxp/.gem/ruby/2.3.0/bin:/Users/spiffxp/.rubies/ruby-2.3.0/lib/ruby/gems/2.3.0/bin:/Users/spiffxp/.rubies/ruby-2.3.0/bin:/Users/spiffxp/.virtualenv/bin:/Users/spiffxp/.gvm/pkgsets/go1.7/global/bin:/Users/spiffxp/.gvm/gos/go1.7/bin:/Users/spiffxp/.gvm/pkgsets/go1.7/global/overlay/bin:/Users/spiffxp/.gvm/bin:/Users/spiffxp/.gvm/bin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin:/Users/spiffxp/w/go/bin
ls: /Users/spiffxp/w/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/third_party/etcd: No such file or directory
!!! [0223 10:39:40] Call tree:
!!! [0223 10:39:40]  1: /Users/spiffxp/w/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/hack/lib/etcd.sh:55 kube::etcd::validate(...)
!!! [0223 10:39:40]  2: hack/make-rules/test-integration.sh:58 kube::etcd::start(...)
!!! [0223 10:39:40]  3: hack/make-rules/test-integration.sh:107 runTests(...)
+++ [0223 10:39:40] Cleaning up etcd
+++ [0223 10:39:40] Integration test cleanup complete
```

**What you expected to happen**:
```
#...
+++ [0223 10:20:47] Starting etcd instance
etcd --advertise-client-urls http://127.0.0.1:2379 --data-dir /tmp.k8s/tmp.u7dliCc2Qm --listen-client-urls http://127.0.0.1:2379 --debug > "/dev/null" 2>/dev/null
Waiting for etcd to come up.
+++ [0223 10:20:48] On try 1, etcd: : http://127.0.0.1:2379
{"action":"set","node":{"key":"/_test","value":"","modifiedIndex":4,"createdIndex":4}}
```

**How to reproduce it** (as minimally and precisely as possible): `make test-integration`

**Anything else we need to know**: `git-bisect` tells me this was caused by #41540
title: `make test-integration` fails to launch etcd on macOS
